titleStmt.title: Nevves from forraigne parts for the last two weeks past, very fitting for this state to take notice of in this time of division and distraction especially the great councell of the kingdome, the Parliament : in which you shall fine matter enough to make use of, according to the old proverb, When your neighbours house is on fire looke to your owne ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London for Nath. Butter,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
